name: Typo3-restclient
tagline: A REST client for TYPO3 CMS
body:
# Introduction

This extension basically provides a class library for sending HTTP requests and receiving HTTP responses from a RESTful API resource.  
It supports the CRUD operations with the shorthands get/post/put/delete.   
You can set many options such as error logs, timeout, proxy with basic/digest authentication, ssl certificate, cookies, and others.     
The HttpClient class is cURL library based.  

# Requirements

It requires TYPO3 6.2 and PHP 5.3.  
Also it uses cURL librabry, then you should have installed the libcurl package (>=7.10.5).  

# Questions and feedback

If you have questions, feedback or suggestions you can send me a mail [tommasosacramone.www@gmail.com](mailto:tommasosacramone.www@gmail.com).
